code doc generation



DocHandle

typedef void DocHandle;
type: C typedef
description: Documentation project handle

DocElementType

type: C enum
description: types of documentation elements available
DOC_CMAKE_MACRO
DOC_C_DEFINE
DOC_C_FUNCTION
DOC_C_FUNCTION_POINTER
DOC_C_STRUCT
DOC_C_UNION
DOC_C_ENUM
DOC_C_TYPEDEF
DOC_C_VARIABLE
DOC_C_CODE
DOC_C_FILE
DOC_GLSL_FILE
DOC_TEXT
DOC_IMAGE
DOC_COUNT

util_doc_type_from_string

DocElementType util_doc_type_from_string(const char *text);
type: C function
description: return doc element type from string

type: C function
description: create documentation project

type: C function
description: delete documentation project

type: C function
description: parse a folder for c files

type: C function
description: add a doc section to a doc module

type: C function
description: add a c code element to a doc section
